AbortAndRollbackChangeOrder.summary: Terminates a change process and rolls back the application. This operation is applicable to applications that are deployed in Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) clusters.

AddLogPath.title: AddLogPath
AddLogPath.summary: Adds a log directory to an application. This operation is applicable to applications that are deployed in Alibaba Cloud Elastic Compute Service (ECS) clusters and hybrid cloud ECS clusters.

AuthorizeApplication.title: AuthorizeApplication
AuthorizeApplication.summary: Grants a Resource Access Management (RAM) user the permissions on a specified application.

AuthorizeResourceGroup.title: AuthorizeResourceGroup
AuthorizeResourceGroup.summary: Grants a Resource Access Management (RAM) user the permissions on a resource group.

AuthorizeRole.title: AuthorizeRole
AuthorizeRole.summary: Assigns one or more roles to a RAM user.

BindEcsSlb.title: BindEcsSlb
BindEcsSlb.summary: Binds a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance to an application that is deployed in an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) cluster.

BindK8sSlb.summary: Binds a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance to an application that is deployed in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

BindSlb.summary: Binds a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance to an application in Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS).

ChangeDeployGroup.summary: Changes the application instance group for an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance in an ECS cluster.

ContinuePipeline.title: ContinuePipeline
ContinuePipeline.summary: Manually confirms the release of the next batch.

ConvertK8sResource.summary: Converts a Deployment into an application.

CreateApplicationScalingRule.title: CreateApplicationScalingRule
CreateApplicationScalingRule.summary: Creates an auto scaling policy for an application.

CreateIDCImportCommand.title: CreateIDCImportCommand
CreateIDCImportCommand.summary: Generates a command that is used to import instances to a hybrid cloud Elastic Compute Service (ECS) cluster.

CreateK8sService.title: CreateK8sService
CreateK8sService.summary: Creates an application service in a Kubernetes cluster.

DeleteApplicationScalingRule.summary: Deletes an auto scaling policy for an application.

DeleteCluster.title: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.summary: Deletes an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) cluster or cancels the import of a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

DeleteClusterMember.title: DeleteClusterMember
DeleteClusterMember.summary: Removes an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance from a cluster.

DeleteDeployGroup.title: DeleteDeployGroup
DeleteDeployGroup.summary: Deletes an instance group for an application.

DeleteK8sApplication.title: DeleteK8sApplication
DeleteK8sApplication.summary: Deletes an application from a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

DeleteK8sService.title: DeleteK8sService
DeleteK8sService.summary: Deletes an application service from a Kubernetes cluster.

DeleteLogPath.title: DeleteLogPath
DeleteLogPath.summary: Removes a log directory from an application. This operation is applicable to applications that are deployed in Alibaba Cloud Elastic Compute Service (ECS) clusters and hybrid cloud ECS clusters.

DeleteRole.title: DeleteRole
DeleteRole.summary: Deletes a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

DeployApplication.title: DeployApplication
DeployApplication.summary: Deploys an application in an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) cluster.

DeployK8sApplication.title: DeployK8sApplication
DeployK8sApplication.summary: Deploys an application in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster or a serverless Kubernetes cluster.

DescribeApplicationScalingRules.title: DescribeApplicationScalingRules
DescribeApplicationScalingRules.summary: Queries the auto scaling policies of an application.

DisableApplicationScalingRule.title: DisableApplicationScalingRule
DisableApplicationScalingRule.summary: Disables an auto scaling policy for an application.

EnableApplicationScalingRule.title: EnableApplicationScalingRule
EnableApplicationScalingRule.summary: Enables an auto scaling policy for an application.

GetAppDeployment.title: GetAppDeployment
GetAppDeployment.summary: Queries the information about the Deployment of a Kubernetes application.

GetApplication.title: GetApplication
GetApplication.summary: Queries the details about a specified application in an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) cluster.

GetChangeOrderInfo.title: GetChangeOrderInfo
GetChangeOrderInfo.summary: Queries the details about a change process.

GetContainerConfiguration.title: GetContainerConfiguration
GetContainerConfiguration.summary: Queries the Tomcat configuration of an application or an instance group in which an application is deployed.

GetJavaStartUpConfig.title: GetJavaStartUpConfig
GetJavaStartUpConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of Java startup parameters for an application.

GetJvmConfiguration.title: GetJvmConfiguration
GetJvmConfiguration.summary: Queries the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) configuration of an application or an instance group in which an application is deployed.

GetK8sAppPrecheckResult.summary: Queries the precheck result of a Kubernetes application.

GetK8sApplication.title: GetK8sApplication
GetK8sApplication.summary: Queries the information about applications deployed in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster or a serverless Kubernetes cluster.

GetK8sCluster.summary: Queries Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) clusters or Serverless Kubernetes clusters in a specified region.

GetK8sServices.summary: Queries application services that are deployed in a Kubernetes cluster.

GetPackageStorageCredential.title: GetPackageStorageCredential
GetPackageStorageCredential.summary: Queries the Security Token Service (STS) tokens that are required for temporary storage.

GetSecureToken.title: GetSecureToken
GetSecureToken.summary: Queries the security token information of a namespace. You can call this operation to query information, such as the AccessKey ID, AccessKey secret, tenant ID, and the domain name of Address Server, for the specified namespace.

GetWebContainerConfig.title: GetWebContainerConfig
GetWebContainerConfig.summary: Queries the Tomcat configurations of an application.

ImportK8sCluster.title: ImportK8sCluster
ImportK8sCluster.summary: Imports a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster or a serverless Kubernetes cluster to Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS).

InsertApplication.title: InsertApplication
InsertApplication.summary: Creates an application in an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) cluster.

InsertClusterMember.title: InsertClusterMember
InsertClusterMember.summary: Imports Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances into an ECS cluster.

InsertDeployGroup.title: InsertDeployGroup
InsertDeployGroup.summary: Creates an instance group for a specified application.

InsertK8sApplication.title: InsertK8sApplication
InsertK8sApplication.summary: Creates an application in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster or serverless Kubernetes cluster.

InsertOrUpdateRegion.title: InsertOrUpdateRegion
InsertOrUpdateRegion.summary: Creates or edits a custom namespace.

InstallAgent.title: InstallAgent
InstallAgent.summary: Uses the Cloud Assistant provided by Elastic Compute Service (ECS) to install Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS) Agent and imports ECS instances to EDAS.

ListAliyunRegion.title: ListAliyunRegion
ListAliyunRegion.summary: Queries Alibaba Cloud regions supported by Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS).

ListBuildPack.title: ListBuildPack
ListBuildPack.summary: Queries Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS) Container versions.

ListClusterMembers.title: ListClusterMembers
ListClusterMembers.summary: Queries Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances in a cluster.

ListComponents.title: ListComponents
ListComponents.summary: Queries the components that are related to applications in Elastic Compute Service (ECS) clusters.

ListConsumedServices.title: ListConsumedServices
ListConsumedServices.summary: Queries the services that are consumed by an application.

ListConvertableEcu.title: ListConvertableEcu
ListConvertableEcu.summary: Queries the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances that can be imported to a specified cluster. This operation is applicable to ECS clusters.

ListDeployGroup.summary: Queries the instance groups to which an application is deployed.

ListEcsNotInCluster.title: ListEcsNotInCluster
ListEcsNotInCluster.summary: Queries all Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances that have not been imported to clusters.

ListEcuByRegion.title: ListEcuByRegion
ListEcuByRegion.summary: Queries the available elastic compute units (ECUs) in a specified namespace.

ListHistoryDeployVersion.title: ListHistoryDeployVersion
ListHistoryDeployVersion.summary: Queries historical deployment packages of an application.

ListK8sNamespaces.title: ListK8sNamespaces
ListK8sNamespaces.summary: Queries namespaces for a Kubernetes cluster.

ListPublishedServices.title: ListPublishedServices
ListPublishedServices.summary: Queries the services that are published by an application.

ListRecentChangeOrder.title: ListRecentChangeOrder
ListRecentChangeOrder.summary: Queries the change processes of an application.

ListScaleOutEcu.title: ListScaleOutEcu
ListScaleOutEcu.summary: Queries elastic compute units (ECUs) available for scaling out an application in a specified cluster or the cluster where the application is deployed. This operation is applicable to Elastic Compute Service (ECS) clusters.

ListServiceGroups.title: ListServiceGroups
ListServiceGroups.summary: Queries the service groups of a High-Speed Service Framework (HSF) application.

ListSubAccount.title: ListSubAccount
ListSubAccount.summary: Queries the Resource Access Management (RAM) users.

ListSwimmingLane.title: ListSwimmingLane
ListSwimmingLane.summary: Queries lanes in a lane group.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resources.

ListVpc.title: ListVpc
ListVpc.summary: Queries virtual private clouds (VPCs). This operation is applicable to Elastic Compute Service (ECS) clusters and Kubernetes clusters.

MigrateEcu.summary: Migrates an elastic compute unit (ECU) to the default cluster in a specified namespace.

ModifyScalingRule.summary: Modifies the scaling rule for an application.

QueryApplicationStatus.title: QueryApplicationStatus
QueryApplicationStatus.summary: Queries the status of an application.

QueryEccInfo.title: QueryEccInfo
QueryEccInfo.summary: Queries details about an elastic compute container (ECC). This operation is applicable to Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) clusters.

QueryMigrateEcuList.title: QueryMigrateEcuList
QueryMigrateEcuList.summary: Queries the elastic compute units (ECUs) that can be migrated.

QueryMigrateRegionList.title: QueryMigrateRegionList
QueryMigrateRegionList.summary: Queries the namespaces to which an instance can be migrated.

QueryRegionConfig.title: QueryRegionConfig
QueryRegionConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of different regions that are supported by Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS).

QuerySlsLogStoreList.title: QuerySlsLogStoreList
QuerySlsLogStoreList.summary: Queries the configuration details of Log Service for an application.

RestartApplication.summary: Restarts an application. This operation is applicable to applications that are deployed in Elastic Compute Service (ECS) clusters.

RestartK8sApplication.summary: Restarts an application that is deployed in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster or a serverless Kubernetes cluster.

RollbackChangeOrder.title: RollbackChangeOrder
RollbackChangeOrder.summary: Terminates an application change process and rolls back the application. This operation is applicable to applications that are deployed in Elastic Compute Service (ECS) clusters.

ScaleK8sApplication.summary: Scales out or in an application that is deployed in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

ScaleoutApplicationWithNewInstances.title: ScaleoutApplicationWithNewInstances
ScaleoutApplicationWithNewInstances.summary: Purchases Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances in the Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS) console and adds the purchased ECS instances to the specified instance group of an application.

StartK8sAppPrecheck.title: StartK8sAppPrecheck
StartK8sAppPrecheck.summary: Starts precheck for Kubernetes application changes.

StartK8sApplication.summary: Starts an application in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster or Serverless Kubernetes cluster.

StopK8sApplication.summary: Stops an application in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster or a Serverless Kubernetes cluster.

SwitchAdvancedMonitoring.title: SwitchAdvancedMonitoring
SwitchAdvancedMonitoring.summary: Queries the status of the advanced application monitoring feature or configures this feature for an application that is deployed in an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) or Kubernetes cluster.

SynchronizeResource.summary: Synchronizes the basic Alibaba Cloud resources that belong to your account to Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS). This operation is applicable to Elastic Compute Service (ECS) clusters.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags and adds the tags to resources at a time.

TransformClusterMember.summary: Imports or migrates one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances to a cluster.

UnbindK8sSlb.title: UnbindK8sSlb
UnbindK8sSlb.summary: Unbinds a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance from an application that is deployed in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

UnbindSlb.summary: Unbinds a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance from an application.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes one or more tags from one or more resources.

UpdateAccountInfo.title: UpdateAccountInfo
UpdateAccountInfo.summary: Modifies the information about an account.

UpdateApplicationBaseInfo.title: UpdateApplicationBaseInfo
UpdateApplicationBaseInfo.summary: Modifies the name, description, and owner of an application.

UpdateApplicationScalingRule.title: UpdateApplicationScalingRule
UpdateApplicationScalingRule.summary: Modifies an auto scaling policy for an application.

UpdateContainer.title: UpdateContainer
UpdateContainer.summary: Updates the Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS) Container version of a High-Speed Service Framework (HSF) application. EDAS Container includes Ali-Tomcat and Pandora.

UpdateContainerConfiguration.title: UpdateContainerConfiguration
UpdateContainerConfiguration.summary: Configures the Tomcat container for an application or application instance group in an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) cluster.

UpdateHealthCheckUrl.title: UpdateHealthCheckUrl
UpdateHealthCheckUrl.summary: Changes the health check URL for an application.

UpdateHookConfiguration.title: UpdateHookConfiguration
UpdateHookConfiguration.summary: Mounts a script to an application or application instance group.

UpdateJvmConfiguration.title: UpdateJvmConfiguration
UpdateJvmConfiguration.summary: Configures the Java virtual machine (JVM) parameters for an application or an instance group where the application is deployed.

UpdateK8sApplicationBaseInfo.summary: Modifies basic information about an application that is deployed in a Kubernetes cluster.

UpdateK8sApplicationConfig.summary: Updates the configuration of an application in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) or Serverless Kubernetes cluster.

UpdateK8sResource.title: UpdateK8sResource
UpdateK8sResource.summary: Updates a specified resource in a Kubernetes cluster.

UpdateK8sService.summary: Updates an application service in a Kubernetes cluster.

UpdateK8sSlb.summary: Updates the Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance bound to an application that is deployed in a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

UpdateSlsLogStore.title: UpdateSlsLogStore
UpdateSlsLogStore.summary: Configures a Logstore for an application.
